uilabels.UI_CORRUPTDESC:
Salvando interrompido para proteger seus dados salvos.
 Um par de arquivos salvos do relatório de erros (antes e depois) foi criado. Se você continuar sem salvar, ele TALVEZ se recupere, mas recomendamos recarregar.
uilabels.UI_OPTIONSNOTES:
Preferences vary: the Red Grail, among others, has taught us that.

[You can drag a stack by its number badge to move the whole stack. You can zoom with the mouse wheel, or with Q and E. 1, 2 and 3 switch zoom levels. Arrow keys move your view.]
uilabels.UI_OPTIONSNOTES_FE: Preferences vary: the Red Grail, among others, has taught us that.
uilabels.UI_KNOWN_LINUX_1: - Keystrokes may register twice when naming your characters. This is a Unity issue; hoping for a fix!
uilabels.UI_ALTERNATIVE_STARTS_BLURB: DLC and mods can open alternative beginnings to you.
uilabels.UI_MODS_INTRODUCTION: Expansions and mods allow you to play new roles - or change the game in other ways.
uilabels.UI_MODS_INTRODUCTION_STEAM: Find more mods at the Invisible Serapeum.
uilabels.UI_INCOMPATIBLE_SAVE_1: You have an ANTIQUE and BLASPHEMOUS save file from a previous build! Purge it to continue.
uilabels.UI_CORRUPTED_SAVE_DESC: Regrettably, we couldn't recover your save. Click here to see your backup save files - one may still be usable.
uilabels.UI_SAVE_DENIED_DESC: You cannot save within the non-existent walls of the Mansus. Replace the skin of the world before saving your progress, or abandon your efforts since the last save.
uilabels.UI_PURGE_DESC: This will irrevocably destroy your saved progress. You might want to do this if you have a corrupt or old save; or perhaps you want to begin again. But are you quite sure?
uilabels.UI_PLAYLEGACY_DESC: This will begin a new game based on the Legacy you've chosen... which will irrevocably destroy any current saved progress. Are you quite sure?
uilabels.UI_VERSION_NEWS_INTRO:
Welcome to Cultist Simulator. Follow us at www.weatherfactory.biz, and at @factoryweather on Twitter, to learn about upcoming updates and other projects in the Secret Histories setting. If you find a bug or the game is crashing on you, do let us know at support@weatherfactory.biz .

thank you!

- Lottie and Alexis
uilabels.UI_VERSION_NEWS_TEXT:
v2020.9.n.3, 'W Szczebrzeszynie chrząszcz brzmi w trzcinie'

- Steam Workshop integration rendered inactive in GOG edition ;) 


v2020.9.n.2, 'Virtutatis Virtutandis'

- Sulochana can now introduce you to Marinette again in the Grail ascension process.
- Sound effects for pause/unpause behave less mischievously
- Beta EXILE loc for Russian and Chinese

v2020.9.n.1

- Steam Workshop integration and an improved modding framework!
 - key remapping is possible again, finally
 - friendlier log for modding and other purposes
 - lots of work beneath the world's skin to prepare for BOOK OF HOURS development. This may cause undesired side effects and unexpected phenomena. Please let us know any issues at support@weatherfactory.biz as usual!

uilabels.UI_LOADFAILEDDESC: Your save file appears to be corrupt. Try restoring a backup save file or purging your save.
uilabels.LOADING_QUOTE_1: “The Wood grows around the walls of the Mansus. As any student of Histories knows, the Mansus has no walls.” Christopher Illopoly, Travelling at Night
uilabels.LOADING_QUOTE_2: Explore. Take risks. You won't always know what to do next. Keep experimenting, and you'll master it.
uilabels.UI_GREEDY: Grabs a card to fill its void
uilabels.UI_DECAYS: This type of cards decays and can not be stacked.
uilabels.UI_EMPTYSPACE: “It is the empty space which makes the bowl useful” - Lao Tzu
uilabels.UI_ASPECTSREQUIRED: That card must have at least one of these aspects:
uilabels.UI_ASPECTSFORBIDDEN: A card may not go here if it has any of these aspects:
uilabels.UI_LANGSWITCHNOTES: Note: we recommend starting a new game after you switch languages. Switching mid-game can cause issues with the display of some text.
